description:
Intelligent Wubi input method by Sogou

Sogou Wubi Method is a free Wubi input method by Sogou with no ads and good compatibility. It supports 86th, 98th and New Century Wubi input methods, provides Wubi-Pinyin hybrid input and thesaurus synchronization, and is compatible with cellular thesaurus and skins from Sogou Pinyin Method, which is suitable for Wubi input users.
